snippet: Shares of Penney surged after CNBC reported that William A. Ackman had written a letter to his fellow board members urging them to speed up a search for a permanent chief executive.
abstract: Shares of Penney surged after CNBC reported that William A. Ackman had written a letter to his fellow board members urging them to speed up a search for a permanent chief executive.

byline.original: By MICHAEL J. DE LA MERCED

headline.main: J.C. Penney Shares Jump on Report of Push for Permanent Chief
